stories.text:
New minimum consumption package: 39 yuan per month (only 19.90 yuan after discount during 2022) The price of various indicators ranges from 10-50 times

The market price of storage space (OSS) is in the range of 0.003 - 0.005. After the price increase, the price of WeChat is 25 times the market price; storage space is only one of the indicators, and the price increase of other indicators up to 50 times is even more outrageous!

As a developer, you can accept normal commercial price increases, but this kind of price increase that is dozens of times higher than the market price cannot be tolerated; if you are also using the "WeChat Cloud Development" service, what you can do now:

Migrate to other cloud service providers as soon as possible Complaining/reporting to the Municipal Supervision Bureau, this is a malicious price increase, not a normal commercial price increase
stories.title: WeChat is raising prices maliciously, affecting millions of developers
